data.message:
Aleppo is one of the most oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world, and the more dangerous and bloody place as well! In one week more than 300 people been killed in Aleppo, and no one shows any support for those people as Paris!!
Changing the fb profile pic is not that huge thing to do, but it shows some moral support for the Syrians and their struggle to bring freedom and democracy to their country. 

- #MakeFacebookRed to highlight the bloodshed in Syria especially in #Aleppo where hospitals continue to be bombed and civilians killed on a daily basis. -
